lines.text:
[singing]
In olden days a glimpse of stocking / Was looked on as something shocking, / Now, Heaven knows, / Anything goes!
[as she sings the words "anything goes", the title of the film appears onscreen]

[angrily, to Billy]
You never even laid a hand on me, and I'm not used to a man treating me like that!

[after being "demoted" to "less dangerous"]
I can't understand this Administration!
